Text: Thanks for the upload - just a shame that you couldn't bother to enter useful filenames. At least the id3 info is accurate, so we d/l'ers can fix your omission our damn selves.

7b - Your welcome too

I dont want the track numbers, none of my torrents have them. 
If you or other downloaders want them, then you should try another uploader.

But when you import this music folder into your i-tunes or whatever you use, the track numbers will be displayed.

Joe
